```{r}
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
install.packages("ggplot2")
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)

summary(penguins)

penguin_plot = ggplot(penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal()


```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: plot of penguins
#| label: plot
penguin_plot
```
